column2: Can I just confirm, are you 16 or over?
Can I check, do you work for the police?
Can I confirm, have you called the police to report an incident within the last year?
Base (Those who don't remember calling the police to report an incident within the last year):
Our records indicate that you called ... (police force/constabulary) about ... (ASB closing category) in September last year. Do you remember making this call?
To start, can you tell me how many years you have lived in your local area?

If we were to define your “quality of life” as how you feel overall about your life, including your standard of living, your surroundings, friendships and how you feel day-to-day, how good or bad would you rate your quality of life?
On the whole, do you think that over the past year your local area has got better or worse to live in, or haven't things changed much.
Do you agree or disagree that your local area is a close, tight knit community?
How strongly do you feel you belong to your local area?
Who do you think is responsible for dealing with anti-social behaviour in your local area?
Taking everything into account, would you say the police in your area do a good job or a poor job?

It is the responsibility of the police, local council and other public services working in partnership to deal with anti-social behaviour in your local area. How much would you agree or disagree that they are dealing with the anti-social behaviour issues that matter in this area?
Thinking back over the past 12 months, would you say there is now more anti-social behaviour in your local area, less anti-social behaviour, or about the same amount than there was a year ago?
And would you say that local public services have got better or worse at tackling anti-social behaviour in your area in the last 12 months, or have they not changed?
What types of anti-social behaviour have you been thinking about when answering the last few questions?
Street drinking/drunken behaviour/under age drinking/youths drinking
Youths/teenagers/groups/ gangs loitering on the streets
Out of control dogs/ barking dogs
Base: All who have called the police in past year
How well informed do you feel about what is being done by local public services to tackle anti-social behaviour in your area? Would you say you feel ...?
Base: All who have called the police in past year
Approximately, how many times over the past year have you called the police to report anti-social behaviour?
Base: All who have called the police in past year
And in general, have these calls been to report the same anti-social behaviour problem or related problems, or have they been to report separate problems?
Base: All who have called the police in past year
And roughly how often do you report anti-social behaviour when you witness or experience it?
Base: All who have called the police in past year
When did you last call the police to report anti-social behaviour?
Over one week up to 1 month ago
Over 1 month up to 3 months ago
Over 3 months up to 6 months ago
Over 6 months up to 1 year ago
Base: All who have called the police in past year
The records we have indicate that you made a call to the police in September 2009 to report (ASB closing category). Do you remember making this call?
Base: All who cannot remember ASB call in September 2009
Can you tell me the type of anti-social behaviour your most recent call was about?
Inappropriate use/ sale/ possession of fireworks
Base: All who have called the police in past year
Overall, to what extent were you satisfied or dissatisfied with how the police handled your call?
Base: All who have called the police in past year

Thinking of your contact with the police, overall, to what extent were you satisfied or dissatisfied with the way you were treated by police officers and/ or staff during the course of your contact with them?
Base: All who have called the police in past year
To what extent were you satisfied or dissatisfied with the following aspects of how you were treated by the police?
How well they listened to what you had to say
Base: All who have called the police in past year
To what extent were you satisfied or dissatisfied with the following aspects of how you were treated by the police?
How seriously your call was taken
Base: All who have called the police in past year
I'm now going to ask a few questions about getting hold of the Police. Overall, to what extent were you satisfied with the ease with which you were able to contact the police?
Base: All who have called the police in past year
To what extent were you satisfied or dissatisfied with how quickly the police responded to your initial contact?
Base: All who have called the police in past year
To what extent were you satisfied or dissatisfied with the way in which you were provided with information from the police following your call?
Base: All who have called the police in past year
Did the police tell you that they would be taking action or not be taking action as a result of your call?
Said would probably not take action
Said would definitely not take action
Didn't say one way or the other
Base: All who have called the police in past year
As far as you know, did the police take any action?
Base: All who say that the police took action as a result of their call
What action did the police take?
Spoke to me/ reassured me over the phone
Got other public services/ agencies involved
Patrolled the area/ increased police patrols
Anti-Social Behaviour Order (ASBO) put in place
Took them to court/ charged them
On the spot fine/ fixed penalty notice Issued
Acceptable Behaviour Contract (ABC) put in place
Evicted the offenders/ issued eviction notice
Parenting order/ contract put in place
Base: All who say that the police took action as a result of their call
How satisfied or dissatisfied were you with the action taken by the police?
Base: All who say that the police took action as a result of their call
Did any other local services take any action as a result of your call, for example the council?
Base: All who say that other local services took action as a result of their call
How satisfied or dissatisfied were you with the action taken by this/ these services?
Base: All who have called the police in past year
To what extent do you feel your call made a difference to the problem you were calling about?
Base: All who have called the police in past year
Would you encourage others to make similar reports of anti-social behaviour?
Base: All who have called the police in past year
If you witnessed or experienced the same type of anti-social behaviour in the future, would you report the incident?
Base: All who say they would not report the incident if they witnessed or experienced the same type of anti-social behaviour in the future, or that it depends
Why would/ might you not report it again in the future?
Lack of support from the Police
Too much hassle and time waiting for an unsatisfactory outcome
No point - offenders would be let off (leniency)
Depends on the seriousness/ nature of the incident
I would deal with it myself/ Take matters into my own hands
Lack of faith in the justice system
I was not kept informed/ Lack of communication
Just wouldn't want to get involved/ None of my business
I was made to feel like the criminal/ guilty one
Only if it involved a friend or family member
Police could not deal with this problem
Only if it involved me personally
Base: All who have called the police in past year
What, if anything, could the police have done to improve the service you received on this occasion?
More police on the beat/ more patrol cars/police presence/night patrols
Spoken to me/interviewed me/made face-to-face contact
Monitored the situation/ checked up/returned/ stayed longer
Easier to contact police/direct number/ less use of call centres/free phone
Improved call centres/ customer service/better/ knowledgeable/local call centres
Obtained a conviction/ charged them/taken them to court
More local police/not so far from area/have local police station
Enforced the law/do their job properly
They should  be more polite/not rude/shouting
Given them an ASBO/on the spot fine
They need to work with community/youth centres/ communicate with young people
Made to feel safer/ personal safety
Less PCSO's/police officer should have been sent
Attend in plain clothes/ unmarked cars/no sirens
Information given should have been confidential
Police station to be opened 24 hours
Arranged for fencing/ gates/more lighting to be installed
Has fear of intimidation or repercussions ever stopped you from reporting anti-social behaviour in the past?
Have you ever experienced intimidation or repercussions as a result of reporting anti-social behaviour?
No - have reported antisocial behaviour but have not experienced intimidation or repercussions
No - have not reported anti-social behaviour before
How much of a problem do you think anti-social behaviour is in your area, or do you not think it is a problem at all? Would you say it is a ...?
On a scale from 1 to 10, where 1 is no effect and 10 is total effect, how much does anti-social behaviour affect your everyday quality of life?
To what extent does fear of anti-social behaviour affect your daily routine in the local area where you live, for example areas you may avoid or types of transport you take?
NOT VERY MUCH/ NOT AT ALL
In what ways would you say your daily routine is affected by fear of anti-social behaviour in the local area where you live?
Avoid walking/ staying out late/ going out at night
Avoid groups/ gangs of youths/ school children
Worry about carrying cash/ valuables/ using cash machines
Avoid going out alone/ being alone
Cannot let children go out on their own
Has affected my health/ mentally/physically/ stressed
Daily routine has had to change (not specified )
Worry when away from house/on holiday
Avoid neighbours/do not mix/talk to anybody
Take the car/taxi rather than walking
Keep doors/windows locked/don't open the door
Has affected my quality of life

I am going to read out some different types of anti-social behaviour. For each one, please can you tell me whether or not you would report it if you personally witnessed or experienced it in your local area.

Local public services need to decide how best to use their resources. With this in mind, and thinking about the impact that anti-social behaviour and crime has on you and others in your local area, how important do you think it is for local public services to focus their efforts on tackling the following issues?

Could you please tell me your age?
Not working - looking after house/ children
To which ethnic group do you consider you belong?
ASIAN OR ASIAN BRITISH Any other Asian background
BLACK OR BLACK BRITISH Any other black background
CHINESE OR OTHER ETHNIC GROUP - Chinese

Do you have any long-standing illness, disability or infirmity?
Which of the following applies to the home you are living in?
I own/ am buying my home
I have bought/ am buying my home from the Council
I am renting my home from the Council

How many children aged fifteen or under are there in your household?
